tips.tip: Regular excersise is important for your pet's health. Take them for walks or jogs to keep them fit and happy.
Keep your pet's water bowl clean and filled with fresh water to prevent illness and keep themhydrated.
Create a consistent feeding schedule to help your pet maintain it's digestive health.
Regular vet checkups are essential to catch and treat health issues early.
Socialize your pet to people and other animals to prevent anxiety and aggression.
If possible, take pets outside for walks or playtime to help them burn off energy.
Don't show aggression to your pet. Instead, use positive reinforcement training to teach them good behavior.
